4908.quoteText: The use of the Internet pages of Expo Travel Group is possible without any indication of personal data.
4908.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

tosdr.case: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

4909.quoteText:
Title and name
  • To create a hotel, flight or other bookings in your name and contact you about the services and products you request
4909.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

tosdr.case: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

4911.quoteText:
Below we will explain under which basis we process different information about you, and we will explain the purpose of that processing.

We collect information from you when you place an order, send us a request or enquiry, subscribe to a newsletter, fill out a form, use live chat or speak with us on the phone.
4911.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

4912.quoteText:
Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems and are required to keep the information confidential.
In addition, all sensitive information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL/TLS) technology.
4912.title: info given about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

4913.quoteText:
Below you will find what cookies do we use and why.

__cfduid
Used by the content network, CloudFlare, to identify you as trusted user. Without this cookie you might lose access to our website.
More Info

Tawk_*, __tawkuuid
Cookie that helps us remember you so that we can link live chat sessions together and provide a better personalised experience for you without gaining any personal information from you.

__ga, __gid, __utma, __utmb
These cookies are used to collect information about how our visitors use ExpoBeds website, which we use to help improve it. The collected information is in anonymous form, including the number of visitors to the site, where visitors have come to the site from and the pages they visited.
More Info Opt Out

_hjIncludedInSample
This cookie is set to let Hotjar (analytics service) know whether you are included in the sample group which is used to generate funnels. No personally identifiable information is used.
More Info Opt Out

eb_ref
This cookie is alive only while you browse our website - once you close it, it will be deleted automatically by your browser. The cookie remembers what was the first page you visited within ExpoBeds and did you come from any of our marketing campaigns. This helps us measure the effectiveness of our campaigns.
4913.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

tosdr.case: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website
